price: (42) Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability.
arabic: أَوۡ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِي وَعَدۡنَٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّا عَلَيۡهِم مُّقۡتَدِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: aw nuriyannaka alladhī waʿadnāhum fa-innā ʿalayhim muq'tadirūna
